description:
The goddesses and Gan-chan find a can containing a vile-looking green slime which surprisingly tastes totally delicious. But the origin of this strange food comes as an even greater surprise — a mysterious vending machine which has appeared at the temple. Upon venturing inside, Skuld, Urd and Gan-chan surprise the operators, who eject them from the machine, transform it into a spaceship, and rapidly depart from the temple.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls: The Mysterious Can of Food
Le mystère de la boîte de conserve
Ta ga Tame ni Kane wa Naru: Kanzume no Nazo...?
~誰が為に鐘は鳴る~ 缶詰の謎...?
